column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Corn Elote: I think it was too creamy compared to what I like in a corn elote- was like a creamed corn meats corn elote. There was nothing that brightened the dish up
column2: and we were hoping for something light to bring balance to an overall very decadent dinner. This was also served a la carte in a decent sized portion
column3: but was still extremely expensive for corn (don't remember exactly how much).
